entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is a Hufflepuff student who is serious and determined to walk away from the glory of winning the Triwizard Cup alone. He is described as having a 'shadowy, stubborn face'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a Hogwarts student who is staring at Cedric and considering his proposal to tie for the Triwizard Cup.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is a person whose face shines with admiration when Harry imagines himself winning the Triwizard Cup.

entities.name: hufflepuff house
entities.description: Hufflepuff House is Cedric's house at Hogwarts that hasn't had glory in centuries.

relationships.description: Cedric proposes to Harry that they tie for the Triwizard Cup, and Harry considers it.
Harry desires to hold the Triwizard Cup and win the competition.
